experiences.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
experiences.description: I've contributed to continue improve mobile development of a consumer application designed for restaurant use.

experiences.title: Junior Software Developer
experiences.description: In my line of work, I develop and maintain software that meets clients' diverse needs. I have experience with React, Typescript, JavaScript, Redux, and Material UI on the frontend, as well as Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, GraphQL, JWT, AWS Lambda, Django, and RESTAPI on the backend.In collaboration with cross-functional teams, I help turn conceptual ideas into fully functioning software products that satisfy customers. I keep high-quality code standards, conduct code reviews, and do collaborative programming with team members throughout the development process.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
experiences.description: The projects I have worked on during my internship include React, Typescript, JavaScript, Redux, Redux-saga, MongoDB, AWS cloud, and Docker, among others. Along with my technical contributions, I encourage a collaborative environment by actively supporting and collaborating with my colleagues. In order to improve project management practices and ensure our collective technical success, I am committed to adopting Agile methods.

experiences.title: Sales Representative
experiences.description: I worked as a salesperson in the Asian food store warehouse. My main job was to handle customer orders by phone and email. I also kept track of the storages via the SAP system to make sure the records match and there's no duplication.

projects.name: Bitcoin guessing Game
projects.description: The Bitcoin Guessing Game is a React Typescript project with a user interface designed using Tailwind CSS. The game aims to provide users with an interactive experience by allowing them to guess the current Bitcoin price without requiring any registration. Key features of the game include real-time Bitcoin price updates, player scoring, and immediate feedback on guessing accuracy

projects.name: 3D Sky App
projects.description: A 3D web application that using React fiber to create motion of the 3D models. The application is hosted in Netifly, user can scrolling to move the 3D object.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that tracks weather based on users' geolocation. The application launched on AWS with AWS CloudFront, and the backend hosted on AWS Lightsail.

projects.name: HSL Bike Journey
projects.description: I've made a web UI for finding city bike stations, showing details about them, and showing statistics about trips people take with city bikes. As part of the overall user experience, users are able to explore transit routes and discover various stations with an integrated interactive map feature. Comprehensive station information is also offered.

projects.name: HSL Bike Journey API
projects.description: In this project, I extracted data efficiently from CSV files, merged it into PostgreSQL, and used TypeORM to build queries to handle a lot of data. I built a scalable RESTful API architecture with various endpoints to support the project's functionalities. A Dockerized deployment system was also implemented to make the project more efficient and easy to manage.

projects.name: Mini Museum App
projects.description: An application to act as virtual museum during pandemic time for museum lover to explore the arts of Egypt from Metropolitan Museum of Art Collection.

projects.name: Uni App
projects.description: In the project, we designed and prototyped a custom solution for a social app for universities in Finland. I made sure the overall user experience was enhanced by designing and prototyping user interfaces. UX design is my area of expertise, so I'm confident in developing tailored solutions to meet the needs of specific users.
